setting.name: formsDateFormat
setting.description: The format of the dates passed in the xml of the xforms model. Please make sure this matches with the date format of your data entry applications, else you will get wrong dates on the server.

setting.name: smsFieldSepChar
setting.description: The separator for form fields in an text sms used to submit data

setting.name: smsSendFailureReports
setting.description: Flag to determine if the sms sender wants failure reports

setting.name: smsSendSuccessReports
setting.description: Flag to determine if the sms sender wants success reports

setting.name: smsValidateNamePassword
setting.description: Determines if each sms is expected to contain a user name and password

setting.name: smsValidatePhoneNo
setting.description: Determines if we should accept only those phone numbers attached to user accounts

setting.name: submitDateFormat
setting.description: The format of the dates passed in the xml of the xforms model. Please make sure this matches with the date format of your data entry applications, else you will get wrong dates on the server.
